=`ToInt32`=
{{{public Int32 ToInt32()}}}

Converts this mstring to Int32.

===Example=== 
{{{
/*
Sample Input:

123|apple|444
444|lemon|555
54|orange|666
778|lime|777
123|soda|888
*/

public virtual void Map(ByteSlice line, MapOutput output)
{
    mstring sLine = mstring.Prepare(line);

    mstringarray parts = sLine.MSplit('|');

    int i1 = parts[0].ToInt32();
    mstring value = parts[1];
    int i2 = parts[2].ToInt32();

    int total = i1 + i2;

    mstring key = mstring.Prepare(total);

    output.Add(key, value);
} 
}}}
----



=`ToInt`=
{{{public Int32 ToInt()}}}

Converts this mstring to Int32.
===Remarks===
This is equivalent to ToInt32().

===Example=== 
{{{
/*
Sample Input:

123|apple|444
444|lemon|555
54|orange|666
778|lime|777
123|soda|888
*/

public virtual void Map(ByteSlice line, MapOutput output)
{
    mstring sLine = mstring.Prepare(line);

    mstringarray parts = sLine.MSplit('|');

    int i1 = parts[0].ToInt();
    mstring value = parts[1];
    int i2 = parts[2].ToInt();

    int total = i1 + i2;

    mstring key = mstring.Prepare(total);

    output.Add(key, value);
}
 
}}}
